articles.title: Declaration campaign launched in s. Korea
articles.content:
March 8 Revolution of Syria commemorated
   PYONGYANG, MARCH 7 (KCNA) -- A MEETING WAS HELD HERE 
THURSDAY TO MARK THE 34TH ANNIVERSARY OF THE MARCH 8 
REVOLUTION IN SYRIA UNDER THE COSPONSORSHIP OF THE KOREA-
SYRIA FRIENDSHIP ASSOCIATION AND THE COMMITTEE FOR CULTURAL 
RELATIONS WITH FOREIGN COUNTRIES.
   PRESENT AT THE MEETING WERE YUN KI JONG, MINISTER OF 
FINANCE AND CHAIRWOMAN OF THE ASSOCIATION, OTHER OFFICIALS 
CONCERNED AND CITIZENS.
   CHARGE D'AFFAIRES AD INTERIM ANWAR AL-FADEL AND OFFICIALS 
OF THE SYRIAN EMBASSY HERE AND SYRIAN STUDENTS STUDYING IN 
KOREA WERE INVITED.
   AT THE MEETING SPEECHES WERE EXCHANGED BEFORE A 
CONGRATULATORY MESSAGE TO THE SYRIAN PRESIDENT WAS ADOPTED.

articles.title: "Cabinet" reshuffle in s. Korea
articles.content:
Declaration campaign launched in s. Korea
   PYONGYANG, MARCH 7 (KCNA) -- THE SUWON CITIZENS' MEASURE 
COMMITTEE FOR REPEAL OF THE AMENDED "LABOUR LAWS" AND "LAW 
ON THE AGENCY FOR NATIONAL SECURITY PLANNING" AND FOR 
DEMOCRACY STAGED A 10,000 CITIZENS' DECLARATION CAMPAIGN FOR 
A TOTAL WITHDRAWAL OF THE RAILROADED BILLS AND A PROBE INTO 
THE TRUTH BEHIND THE HANBO POLITICS-BUSINESS COLLUSION,  A 
SOUTH KOREAN NEWSPAPER SAID.
   THE MEASURE COMMITTEE, CONSISTING OF 20 ODD 
ORGANIZATIONS, DEMANDED IMMEDIATE REPEAL OF THE 
RETROGRESSIVELY REVISED FASCIST LAWS, SAYING THE LAWS SHOULD 
BE DECLARED NULL AND VOID.
   THE HANBO LOAN SCANDAL SHOULD BE PROBED AND THOSE 
INVOLVED BE PUNISHED, IT SAID, STRESSING:
   THE KIM YOUNG SAM "GOVERNMENT" SHOULD STEP DOWN, HOLDING 
ITSELF RESPONSIBLE FOR THE PRESENT SITUATION.
   LET US ACHIEVE GENUINE DEMOCRACY BY THE EFFORTS OF 
WORKERS AND OTHER PEOPLE.

articles.title: Kim Young Sam's drama for camouflaging his colors as kingpin of thieves
articles.content:
"Cabinet" reshuffle in s. Korea
   PYONGYANG, MARCH 7 (KCNA) -- KIM YOUNG SAM ON WEDNESDAY 
REPLACED THE PRIME MINISTER, DEPUTY PRIME MINISTER AND NINE 
MINISTERS OF THE "GOVERNMENT", A RADIO REPORT FROM SEOUL 
SAID.
   ON FEB. 23 HE REMOVED HIS CLOSE "AIDES", THE CHIEF 
SECRETARY AND THREE SENIOR SECRETARIES OF "CHONGWADAE".
   HE HAS ALSO DECIDED TO REORGANIZE THE "NEW KOREA PARTY'S" 
HIERARCHY SOON, THE REPORT SAID.
   HIS "CABINET RESHUFFLE" AND REORGANIZATION ARE NOTHING 
BUT A DECEPTIVE DRAMA OF COVERING THE HANBO LOAN SCANDAL 
WITH A SMOKE SCREEN TO HIDE HIS IRREGULARITIES.
   WITH THIS "RESHUFFLE", SIX "PRIME MINISTERS" WERE CHANGED 
IN SOUTH KOREA IN THE FOUR YEARS UNDER THE "CIVILIAN 
REGIME".
   THE FACTS CLEARLY SHOW HOW UNSTABLE THE "CIVILIAN REGIME" 
HEADED BY KIM YOUNG SAM IS AND HOW BADLY IT IS REJECTED BY 
THE PEOPLE.

articles.title: Japan urged to stop impeding improvement of DPRK-U.S. ties
articles.content:
Kim Young Sam's drama for camouflaging his colors as kingpin of thieves
   PYONGYANG, MARCH 7 (KCNA) -- THE MAKING PUBLIC OF 
PROPERTY BY SOUTH KOREA'S KIM YOUNG SAM SEVERAL DAYS AGO WAS 
A DRAMA FOR ADVERTISING HIS "UPRIGHTNESS" AND VEILING HIS 
TRUE COLORS AS KINGPIN OF THIEVES, SAYS RODONG SINMUN TODAY.
   IN A COMMENTARY THE DAILY SAYS:
   HE DECLARED THAT  HIS PROPERTY WAS ENLARGED BY 98 MILLION 
WON LAST YEAR, REACHING 2,730 MILLION WON IN TOTAL. BUT THIS 
FIGURE IS UNBECOMING TO THE KINGPIN OF THIEVES.
   IT SAYS:
   EVEN THOUGH A TRILLION WON HE RECEIVED FROM ROH TAE WOO 
IS NOT INCLUDED, COUNTLESS IS THE AMOUNT OF MONEY HE 
COLLECTED FROM THE CAMPAIGN OF "MAKING PUBLIC PUBLIC 
OFFICIALS' PROPERTY", THE INTRODUCTION OF THE "SYSTEM 
REQUIRING REAL NAME IN FINANCIAL DEPOSITING", THE 
"INVESTIGATION INTO THE SLUSH FUND SCANDAL", ETC. HE WAS 
BRIBED WITH D50 MILLION IN RETURN FOR LIBERALIZING RICE 
IMPORT, D15 MILLION FOR HIS CONSENTING TO A TREACHEROUS 
DOCUMENT DEMANDING SOUTH KOREA'S INCREASED SHARE OF THE COST 
OF KEEPING U.S. TROOPS IN SOUTH KOREA AND MILLIONS OF 
DOLLARS FOR HIS APPROVING THE PURCHASE OF U.S.-MADE WEAPONS.
   THE HANBO INCIDENT HAS REACHED THE HIGHEST WATERMARK IN 
HIS IRREGULARITIES.
   AFTER HE CAME TO POWER WITH THE HELP OF A LARGE AMOUNT OF 
MONEY GIVEN BY CHUNG TAE SOO, GENERAL CHAIRMAN OF THE 
HANBO BUSINESS GROUP, HE HAD PRESSURIZED BANKS TO GRANT 
LOANS OF  NEARLY 6 TRILLION WON TO HANBO, FOR WHICH HE 
RECEIVED A TRILLION WON FROM IT.
   THIS IS WHAT SOUTH KOREAN POLITICIANS AND BUSINESSMEN ARE 
CLAIMING AND WHAT CHUNG HIMSELF ADMITTED. IT IS NOT EASY TO 
FIGURE UP HOW MUCH KIM YOUNG SAM HAS AMASSED IN A CRAFTY WAY 
SINCE HE TOOK OFFICE.
   WITH NO DRAMA CAN HE COVER UP HIS TRUE COLORS AS KINGPIN 
OF IRREGULARITIES AND THEFT. THE SOUTH KOREAN PEOPLE WILL 
NEVER TOLERATE HIM.

articles.title: Press review
articles.content:
Japan urged to stop impeding improvement of DPRK-U.S. ties 
  PYONGYANG, MARCH 7 (KCNA) -- THE JAPANESE REACTIONARIES 
SHOULD PONDER OVER GRAVE CONSEQUENCES TO BE ENTAILED BY 
THEIR ACTS OF OBSTRUCTING THE IMPROVEMENT OF DPRK-U.S. 
RELATIONS AND ENCOURAGING THE SOUTH KOREAN PUPPETS TO INTER-
KOREAN CONFRONTATION, URGES RODONG SINMUN IN A COMMENTARY 
TODAY.  THE DAILY SAYS:
   THE JAPANESE REACTIONARIES INTEND TO GRATIFY THEIR 
MILITARIST DESIGN UNDER THE "U.S.-JAPAN SECURITY SYSTEM". IT 
IS ILLUSTRATED BY THE FACT THAT THE JAPANESE AUTHORITIES ARE 
CALLING FOR "JAPAN-U.S. COOPERATION FOR COPING WITH 
CONTINGENCY" IN THE KOREAN PENINSULA AND FOR "ADJUSTMENT OF 
LEGISLATION".
   WHAT THE JAPANESE REACTIONARIES ARE SEEKING IS TO 
MAINTAIN AND STRENGTHEN THE "JAPAN-U.S. SECURITY SYSTEM", 
THAT IS THE MILITARY ALLIANCE, UNDER THE PRETEXT OF 
"COOPERATION FOR COPING WITH CONTINGENCY" IN THE PENINSULA, 
REALISE THEIR AMBITIOUS DESIGN TO TURN THEIR COUNTRY INTO A 
MILITARY POWER AND LAUNCH OVERSEAS MILITARY AGGRESSION 
ABOARD THE U.S. WAR CHARIOT.
   BUT THEY ARE NOW WORRIED ABOUT THEIR LOSING THE 
GROUND TO CLAMOUR ABOUT "CONTINGENCY" IN THE KOREAN 
PENINSULA WHICH IS NEEDED TO JUSTIFY THEIR MOVES TO TURN THE 
COUNTRY INTO A MILITARY POWER AND SET ON THE ROAD OF 
OVERSEAS EXPANSION.
   THEY WANT NEITHER IMPROVED RELATIONS BETWEEN THE DPRK AND 
THE UNITED STATES NOR RELAXED SITUATION ON THE KOREAN 
PENINSULA.
   IF DPRK-U.S. RELATIONS ARE NORMALIZED AND TENSION EASED 
IN THE KOREAN PENINSULA, THEY WILL LOSE THE PRETEXT FOR 
RAISING OUTCRIES OVER "CONTINGENCY" IN THE PENINSULA.
   THIS IS WHY THEY ARE DESPERATELY TRYING TO IMPEDE THE 
IMPROVEMENT OF DPRK-U.S. TIES, WHILE ENCOURAGING THE SOUTH 
KOREAN PUPPETS TO INTER-KOREAN CONFRONTATION IN A BID TO 
KEEP TENSION RUNNING HIGH IN THE PENINSULA.
   WE CANNOT CONNIVE AT THEIR SCHEME TO STRENGTHEN THE 
AGGRESSIVE COLLUSION WITH THE U.S. UNDER THE PRETEXT AND 
LEGALIZE THE REINVASION OF KOREA THROUGH "SECURITY EMERGENCY 
LEGISLATIVE ARRANGEMENTS".
   IF THEY CONTINUE SUCH THINGS IN DEFIANCE OF OUR WARNING, 
JAPAN WILL GET ONLY DISGRACE AND DESTRUCTION.

articles.title: Crafty political burlesque
articles.content:
Press review 
   PYONGYANG, MARCH 7 (KCNA) -- PAPERS HERE TODAY CARRY NEWS 
THAT THE GREAT LEADER COMRADE KIM JONG IL SENT THANKS AND 
GIFTS TO OFFICIALS OF FORESTRY SECTION AND AMBULANCES TO 
HOSPITALS IN PYONGYANG.
  UNDER THE BANNER TITLES "THE RESPECTED COMRADE KIM JONG IL 
IS THE GREAT SUN OF THE 21ST CENTURY" AND "THE RESPECTED 
COMRADE KIM JONG IL, THE GREAT SUN OF THE 21ST CENTURY WITH 
OUTSTANDING LEADERSHIP ABILITY" PAPERS CARRY NEWS THAT HIS 
55TH BIRTHDAY WAS CELEBRATED IN DIFFERENT COUNTRIES.
   RODONG SINMUN REPORTS THAT COMRADE KIM JONG IL SENT 
THANKS TO WORKERS, TECHNICIANS, OFFICE WORKERS AND FARMERS 
FOR THEIR CONTRIBUTIONS TO BUILDING RURAL DWELLING HOUSES IN 
SOUTH PHYONGAN PROVINCE.
   GIVEN IN THE PRESS IS NEWS THAT INNOVATIONS WERE BROUGHT 
ABOUT IN RAILWAY PROJECT BETWEEN WONSAN AND MT. KUMGANG, 
MINOR POWER STATIONS ARE BEING BUILT AND WORKING PEOPLE 
ACROSS THE COUNTRY HAVE TAKEN AN ACTIVE PART IN SPRING LAND 
MANAGEMENT. 
   RODONG SINMUN CARRIES NEWS THAT 10,000 CITIZENS' 
DECLARATION CAMPAIGN TOOK PLACE IN SUWON OF SOUTH KOREA TO 
DEMAND THE WITHDRAWAL OF THE FASCIST LAWS AND DENOUNCE THE 
HANBO INCIDENT AND OVERSEAS COMPATRIOTS ISSUED A DECLARATION 
ON SITUATION.
   PAPERS INFORM THE READERS THAT SOUTH KOREAN PUBLIC 
CIRCLES DEMANDED AN END TO THE CORRUPT RULE OF THE KIM YOUNG 
SAM  "CIVILIAN-VEILED REGIME" IN CONNECTION WITH THE HANBO 
INCIDENT.
   RODONG SINMUN IN A COMMENTARY DESCRIBES OPENING TO THE 
PUBLIC OF PROPERTY BY THE TRAITOR KIM YOUNG SAM AS A FALSE 
FARCE TO MAKE A MOCKERY OF THE PEOPLE.
   MINJU JOSON IN A COMMENTARY DENOUNCES THE "CABINET 
RESHUFFLE" BY THE TRAITOR KIM YOUNG SAM AS A CUNNING 
POLITICAL BURLESQUE.
   RODONG SINMUN RUNS A COMMENTARY SAYING THAT THE JAPANESE 
REACTIONARIES ARE STRENGTHENING THE "SECURITY SYSTEM" WITH 
THE U.S. UNDER THE PRETEXT OF "EMERGENCY" ON THE KOREAN 
PENINSULA.
   PAPERS GIVE AN ACCOUNT OF A MEETING OF THE INTERNATIONAL 
COORDINATING COMMITTEE  OF THE 14TH WORLD FESTIVAL OF YOUTH 
AND STUDENTS.

articles.title: Continuous guidance tours of Secy. Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
Crafty political burlesque

COMMENTING ON ANOTHER ROUND OF "CABINET RESHUFFLE" IN SOUTH 
KOREA, SAYS THAT THE DECEPTION OF THE "RESHUFFLE" WAS 
BROUGHT TO LIGHT BY THE FACT THAT THE TRAITOR KIM YOUNG SAM, 
WHO SHOULD HAVE BEEN REPLACED BEFORE ANYONE ELSE, REMAINS IN 
POWER.  THE NEWS ANALYST GOES ON:
   COVERING UP HIS TRUE COLORS AS THE PRINCIPAL CULPRIT OF 
THE HANBO INCIDENT AND AVOIDING THE RESPONSIBILITY FOR IT, 
KIM YOUNG SAM IS TRYING TO EMERGE FROM THE PRESENT CRISIS 
THROUGH THE REPLACEMENT OF HIS CLOSE AIDES. THIS IS A CRAFTY 
ACT INDEED.
   HE DESCRIBED THE "CABINET RESHUFFLE" AND THE REPLACEMENT

AND ABROAD.
   THE "CABINET SHAKE-UP" IS NOT "RENOVATION" BUT ANOTHER 
POLITICAL BURLESQUE, WITH WHICH THE TRAITOR IS SEEKING TO 
CONCEAL THE TRUTH BEHIND THE HANBO SCANDAL HE HIMSELF IS

REACTIONARY CONSERVATIVE FORCES TO EXPIRE HIS REMAINING TERM 
OFFICE.
   HOWEVER, WITH NOTHING CAN THE TRAITOR KIM YOUNG SAM 
BRIDGE OVER THE PRESENT SERIOUS RULING CRISIS AND SAVE HIS 
DESTINY FROM THE RUIN.

articles.title: Happy Korean women
articles.content:
Continuous guidance tours of Secy. Kim Jong Il 
   PYONGYANG, MARCH 7 (KCNA) -- COMRADE KIM JONG IL, SUPREME 
COMMANDER OF THE KOREAN PEOPLE'S ARMY (KPA), ON MONDAY 
INSPECTED KPA UNIT 212, WHICH DEFENDS THE FOREFRONT ON THE 
WEST COAST OF KOREA.
   AT THE FOREWARD COMMAND POST, HE LEARNED ABOUT THE 
DEFENCE SITUATION AND GAVE THE UNIT TASKS TO STRENGTHEN ITS 
FIGHTING EFFICIENCY. HE LOOKED AT ENEMY-CONTROLLED KYODONG 
AND KANGHWA ISLANDS ON THE WEST SEA OF KOREA THREE 
KILOMETRES AWAY FROM HIS POSITION, LEARNED ABOUT THE ENEMY 
SITUATION AND GAVE THE UNIT RELEVANT TASKS.
   THUS, HE GREETED THIS SPRING WITH HIS INSPECTION OF THE 
FOREFRONT.
   HE MAKES LOCAL GUIDANCE TOURS TIRELESSLY TO STRENGTHEN 
THE KPA AND PROMOTE THE HAPPINESS OF THE PEOPLE.
   WHETHER IT RAINS OR SNOWS, HE MAKES HIS WAY EVEN TO A 
REMOTE ISLAND AND A MOUNTAIN VILLAGE THROUGH HIGH WAVES OR 
RUGGED SWAMP IF IT IS FOR THE SAKE OF THE ARMY, THE 
PEOPLE AND THE REVOLUTION.
   LAST YEAR HE INSPECTED UNITS OF THE THREE SERVICES OF THE 
KPA, INCLUDING THE EASTERN, WESTERN AND CENTRAL SECTORS OF 
THE FRONT. HIS TRAVEL COVERED THOUSANDS OF MILES.
   HE EVEN MADE A RISKY INSPECTION OF THE PANMUNJOM MISSION 
OF THE KPA, FROM WHICH THE ENEMIES WERE WITHIN HAILING 
DISTANCE. HE CLIMBED A STEEP MOUNTAIN PASS AND FORCED HIS 
WAY TO VISIT SERVICEMEN AND SOLDIER-BUILDERS OF POWER 
STATIONS. HIS CLOTHES WERE WET AT A CONSTRUCTION SITE AND 
DRIED IN THE CAR. AFTER HIS LONG JOURNEY, HE WORKED INTO THE 
NEXT MORNING IN HIS OFFICE. HE TOOK A SHORT SLEEP IN THE CAR 
AND HAD SIMPLE MEALS DURING HIS LOCAL GUIDANCE TOUR. HE 
GREETS THE MORNING IN HIS OFFICE AND LEAVES FOR LOCAL 
GUIDANCE EVEN IF IT IS LATE AT NIGHT.
   HE IS A GREAT REVOLUTIONARY WHO TRAVELS EVERY NOOK AND 
CORNER OF THE COUNTRY IN DISREGARD TO BAD WEATHER AND 
REGARDS MANIFOLD FATIGUE AS WORTHWHILE FOR THE COUNTRY'S 
PROSPERITY AND THE PEOPLE'S HAPPINESS.
   EVERY RAINY AND SNOWY DAY, THEREFORE, THE SERVICEMEN AND 
CIVILIANS ALL WISH THAT HE WOULD NOT MAKE A LOCAL TOUR BUT 
TAKE EVEN A MOMENT'S REST IN PEACE.

articles.title: Korean delegation leaves for U.S.
articles.content:
Happy Korean women 
   PYONGYANG, MARCH 7 (KCNA) -- KOREAN WOMEN LOOK BACK ON 
THE RADICAL CHANGES IN THEIR POSITION WITH THE APPROACH OF 
THE INTERNATIONAL WOMEN'S HOLIDAY (MARCH 8).
   BEFORE THE LIBERATION OF THE COUNTRY FROM JAPANESE 
COLONIAL RULE, THEY UNDERWENT DOUBLE AND TREBLE 
MALTREATMENT UNDER THE YOKE OF FEUDALISTIC MALE CHAUVINISM 
AND CONFUCIAN PRINCIPLES.
   TODAY THEY TAKE AN ACTIVE PART IN SOCIAL LIFE WITH EQUAL 
RIGHTS WITH MEN.
   THIS IS A RESULT OF THE TIRELESS EFFORTS OF THE GREAT 
LEADER PRESIDENT KIM IL SUNG, WHO PAID DEEP ATTENTION TO THE 
SOLUTION OF THE WOMEN'S PROBLEM FROM THE BEGINNING OF HIS 
REVOLUTIONARY CAREER.
   IN MAY 1936 DURING THE ANTI-JAPANESE REVOLUTIONARY 
STRUGGLE, HE PUBLISHED THE TEN-POINT PROGRAMME OF THE 
ASSOCIATION FOR THE RESTORATION OF THE FATHERLAND.
   IT IS STIPULATED IN THE PROGRAMME THAT THE CASTE SYSTEM 
WHICH DIVIDES THE NOBLES AND THE COMMON PEOPLE AND OTHER 
INEQUALITIES SHOULD BE ABOLISHED, EQUALITY BASED ON HUMANITY 
IRRESPECTIVE OF SEX, NATIONALITY OR RELIGION BE ENSURED, THE 
SOCIAL POSITION OF WOMEN BE IMPROVED AND THEIR PERSONALITIES 
BE RESPECTED. THUS, HE DEFINED SOCIAL LIBERATION OF WOMEN AS 
ONE OF THE MAJOR OBJECTIVES OF THE KOREAN COMMUNISTS.
   IN JULY 1946, THE YEAR AFTER KOREA'S LIBERATION, HE 
PROMULGATED LAW ON SEX EQUALITY HE HAD WORKED OUT, WHICH 
MEANT A NEW BIRTH OF KOREAN WOMEN WHO ACCOUNT FOR A HALF OF 
THE POPULATION.
   THE LAW FREED WOMEN FROM ALL SUFFERINGS, MISFORTUNES, 
RIGHTLESS LOT AND INEQUALITIES ONCE AND FOR ALL IN A 
LIBERATED KOREA.
   TODAY KOREAN WOMEN GIVE FULL PLAY TO THEIR HOPES AND 
TALENTS AND ROLL ONE OF THE TWO WHEELS OF REVOLUTION.
   WOMEN ACCOUNT FOR NEARLY A HALF OF LABOR FORCE IN THE 
NATIONAL ECONOMY.
   THEY PLAY A BIG ROLE IN EDUCATION, CULTURE, HEALTH CARE, 
COMMERCE AND TEXTILE, DAILY NECESSITIES AND FOODSTUFF 
INDUSTRIES. A LOT OF UNITS ARE RUN ONLY BY WOMEN.
   MANY WOMEN TAKE PART IN STATE POLITICS AS DEPUTIES TO 
PEOPLE'S POWER BODIES AT DIFFERENT LEVELS AND WORK AS SENIOR 
OFFICIALS OF PARTY AND STATE ORGANS, MANAGING DIRECTORS OF 
INDUSTRIAL ESTABLISHMENTS AND CHAIRPERSONS OF MANAGEMENT 
BOARDS OF COOPERATIVE FARMS.
   AMONG FAMOUS ENGINEERS AND EXPERTS AND TALENTED 
SCIENTISTS, ARTISTES AND ATHLETES, WOMEN HOLD A LARGE 
PROPORTION AND MANY OF THEM HAVE HONORARY TITLES, ACADEMIC 
DEGREES AND TITLES.
